name: Match Maker: US Geography Facts
overview: Matchmaker US Geography is a new curriculum-based learning program that has been teacher designed to develop and strengthen knowledge of geographic facts. It will support most US geography courses taught in schools. The program is versatile and easy to use. It requires no previous computer background. Matchmaker US Geography works on the principle of matching words and phrases. It is excellent for expanding and reinforcing factual knowledge of US geography. Matchmaker US Geography also has a unique authoring feature which lets you create your own programs, quizzes and games simply by typing your entries on the computer keyboard.
